But Belshazzar lifted himself up against the Lord. "Thou . . . hast not humbled thine heart, though thou knewest all this; but hast lifted up thyself against the Lord of heaven." "Because sentence against an evil work is not executed speedily, therefore the heart of the sons of men is fully set in them to do evil." Too often the patience and forbearance of God makes transgressors bold and unimpressible. 


                                    -223-
